item.title: Answers for Westfield Bondi Junction tragedy delayed 'out of respect'
item.description: <p>Answers from the inquest into the deadly mass stabbing at a shopping mall will be handed down next year out of respect for the victims of a fresh massacre in the same area of Sydney.</p>

item.title: Surviving Bondi gunman wakes from coma as investigations continue into Philippines trip, IS links
item.description: <p>Police are continuing to probe the ties that the Bondi Beach attackers have to Islamic State (IS)﻿ as two homemade flags were found in the car and videos of one of the men preaching on the streets of Sydney&#x27;s south-west surfaced. </p>
